mapper.insert: insert into CAREER_INFO ( CAREER_TTL, CAREER_COMPANY_NM, CAREER_CATEGORY_CD, CAREER_NOTI_START_DT, CAREER_NOTI_END_DT, CAREER_NOTI_LINK, CAREER_RC_YN, CAREER_MIN_SALARY, CAREER_MAX_SALARY, CAREER_COMPANY_LOCATION, CAREER_MIN_CAREER, CAREER_MAX_CAREER, CAREER_KEYWORD ) values( #{careerTtl}, #{careerCompanyNm}, #{careerCategoryCd}, #{careerNotiStartDt}, #{careerNotiEndDt}, #{careerNotiLink}, #{careerRcYn}, #{careerMinSalary}, #{careerMaxSalary}, #{careerCompanyLocation}, #{careerMinCareer}, #{careerMaxCareer}, #{careerKeyword} )
